track.name: Sins Of My Father
comments: how could this exhaust you? It's one of the slowest songs on the album, without all the hoo-ing and haw-ing that the rest of them contain.
...It's placed too early on the album. I'm completely exhausted after hearing this song and it's only the third one.
I actually wish this song was longer.
Monty, you win. Agent Cooper would certainly agree.
We'll have no shouting here. This is a local shop, you know.
No errors here. Wonderful song, wonderful atmosphere.
How is it even possible to say that this song is his "one and only error"? Not that he makes many errors, but this song is just amazing.

Amazing, and not a minute too long. Let it go on, and on, and on. I like it that way. 
Those who don't, switch after 3 minutes if your'e that bored.
why make a 3 minute song when you can make a 10 minute song?
Wow! I'm completely speechless..
tis good
I'm gonna wash the sins of my father...
I listen to the whole song.
I get lost in this one.
Am I the only one to think that this song goes on for too long?
one of the saddest songs ever, brilliant
Heavily underrated. The 166th most listened Tom Waits song over the last six months =(
a work of extreme brilliance!
great album, great song
seeeeeee.. fatoouuu
